alert.note: Alert for Big Lost Highlands, Copper Basin; Frank Church Wilderness; Lost River Range; Sawtooth, Stanley Basin; Sun Valley Region (Idaho) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Winter Storm Warning issued March 30 at 2:20PM MDT until March 30 at 9:00PM MDT by NWS Pocatello
info.description: ...WINTER STORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 9 PM MDT THIS EVENING... * WHAT...Heavy snow. Additional snow accumulations of up to 5 inches in the northern Wood River Valley and up to 2 inches in the Stanley Basin with locally higher totals in the mountains especially around Galena Summit. * WHERE...Borah Peak, Clayton, Stanley, Ketchum, Sun Valley, Galena Summit, and Copper Basin. * WHEN...Until 9 PM MDT this evening. * IMPACTS...Travel could be very difficult. The hazardous conditions could impact the evening commute.
info.instruction: If you must travel, keep an extra flashlight, food, and water in your vehicle in case of an emergency. The latest road conditions can be obtained by calling 5 1 1 or by visiting 511.idaho.gov.

area.areaDesc: Big Lost Highlands, Copper Basin; Frank Church Wilderness; Lost River Range; Sawtooth, Stanley Basin; Sun Valley Region
